Description: Rim and wall sherd of East Greek pottery plate; on top of rim maeander band between bands; at outer edge of floor, between bands with added red bands lined in white, metopal frieze of verticals and alternating solid and outline squares, the latter with dotted centre; red band to the centre; set of four blobs preserved on edge of rim, a band on the underside; two bands on exterior wall.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.1078)
